question: During a recent plane journey, you sat next to a businessman who owns a chain of restaurants. You talked to him and he suggested that you should contact him about a possible job in one of his restaurants.Write a letter to this businessman. In your letter,remind him when and where you mettell him what kind of job you are interested insay why you think you would be suitable for the job
text: Greetings, I am Supun, I hope you can remind me,that  I am the person who sat beside you while you were travelling to Australia for a business trip.

I am writing this to express my interest to work  with you as you encourage me to do so during our flight. If you can remember, I am a computer network engineer, who is currently working at XYZ which is the second largest telecom service provider in our country. I have specialized in Cyber security, so it would be great if you can provide me with  such an opportunity.

I have ten years of experience in the relevant field, and on top of that, recently I obtained the CEH certificate, which is  one of the most valuable certificates  one could have in this field. Moreover, I have been the network manager in our core network division for two years. So, I believe myself a suitable candidate for the position.
Along with this, I am forwarding my resume for your kind reference, and I look forward to hearing from you.
